1.content: When Ken finally escaped school he walked the rest of the way home. Ken's house was a few blocks away so it was a short walk. Once he got home he dropped his bag in the hallway and immediately entered the bathroom. He pulled out the first aid kit and started applying bandages to cuts and some cream to the bruises. "How i wish i could make them pay for what they did. All the times they've done this to me." Ken mumbled as he applied the rest of the bandages. DING DONG. The sound of the doorbell startled him. As he opened the door he saw no one at the door. He looked all around but something finally caught his eye. He sees a package on his front step. H brings it inside and proceeds to open it. Inside he saw what looked like a child's toy. "Who left this toy here?" Ken asked. He picked it up and saw a label: MICROMACRO GUN- USE WITH EXTREME CAUTION. Ken smiled at what he thought and new was pay back. But who should suffer first?
